name: INPaymentAccount
desc: A user account that provides the funds when making a payment.

items.name: init(nickname: INSpeakableString, number: String?, accountType: INAccountType, organizationName: INSpeakableString?, balance: INBalanceAmount?, secondaryBalance: INBalanceAmount?)
items.desc: Initializes a payment account object with the specified account information.

items.name: var nickname: INSpeakableString?
items.desc: A user-defined name that identifies the account.

items.name: var organizationName: INSpeakableString?
items.desc: The name of the organization that supplies the account to the user.

items.name: enum INAccountType
items.desc: Constants indicating the type of account involved in a financial transaction.

items.name: var accountNumber: String?
items.desc: A string to help the user differentiate between similar accounts.

items.name: var balance: INBalanceAmount?
items.desc: The primary balance associated with the account.

items.name: var secondaryBalance: INBalanceAmount?
items.desc: A secondary balance, if any, associated with the account.

items.name: class INBalanceAmount
items.desc: A balance associated with an account.
